file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-44-10-03 - EMERGENCY/PARKING BRAKE HANDLE AND VALVE - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EMERGENCY/PARKING BRAKE HANDLE AND VALVE - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to lubricate the emergency/parking brake handle and roller of emergency/parking brake valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY LUBRICATE EMERGENCY/PARKING ALL 32-44-10-600-801-A ♦ BRAKE CONTROL EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-44-10 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-44-10-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LUBRICATE EMERGENCY/PARKING BRAKE CONTROL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to lubricate the emergency/parking brake handle and roller of emergency/parking brake valve. (2) For a good lubrication, the items must be in a clean condition. Before you apply the grease and oil, clean all surfaces, until there is no dust or used grease. (3) Dust and sand mixed with grease cause a grinding mixture which can badly damage the moving parts. (4) Before the lubrication, it is necessary to remove all grease or dust deposits with a cloth moist with the approved cleaning solvent. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To lubricate the emergency/parking brake Grease gun available handle E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) ASTM-D740 Methyl Ethyl Ketone (MEK) AR MIL-PRF-7870 Oil AR MIL-G-21164 Grease AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit and NLG wheelwell EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 32-44-10 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that NLG safety pin is installed ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). J. Lubricate Mechanical Hardware (Handle) and Roller of Emergency/Parking Brake Valve - Lubrication (Figure 301) SUBTASK 640-002-A (1) NOTE: During the cleaning, do not permit the MEK to touch painted, plastic or rubber surfaces. With a clean cloth soaked in Methyl Ethyl Ketone (MEK), clean the mechanical hardware (handle) and roller of emergency/parking brake valve. Before the MEK evaporates, wipe those areas with a clean, dry cloth. (2) Lubricate the emergency/parking brake handle with oil. (3) Check the roller cam and piston of emergency/parking brake valve for free motion. If necessary lubricate them with grease. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 32-44-10 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
